item.text:
“At that time Michael,

the great prince who watches over your people,

will arise.

There will be a time of distress

unlike any other from the nation’s beginning

up to that time.

But at that time your own people,

all those whose names are found written in the book,

will escape.

Many of those who sleep

in the dusty ground will awake—

some to everlasting life,

and others to shame and everlasting abhorrence.

But the wise will shine

like the brightness of the heavenly expanse.

And those bringing many to righteousness

will be like the stars forever and ever.
“But you, Daniel, close up these words and seal the book until the time of the end. Many will dash about, and knowledge will increase.”
I, Daniel, watched as two others stood there, one on each side of the river.

One <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> to the <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="03847" class="">clothed</st> in <st data-num="0906" class="">linen</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> was <st data-num="04605" class="">above</st> the <st data-num="04325" class="">waters</st> of the <st data-num="02975" class="">river</st>, “<st data-num="05704 04970">When</st> will the <st data-num="07093" class="">end</st> of these <st data-num="06382" class="">wondrous events</st> occur?”

Then I heard the man clothed in linen who was over the waters of the river as he raised both his right and left hands to the sky and made an oath by the one who lives forever: “It is for a time, times, and half a time. Then, when the power of the one who shatters the holy people has been exhausted, all these things will be finished.”
I heard, but I did not understand. So I said, “Sir, what will happen after these things?”

He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="01980" class="">Go</st>, <st data-num="01840" class="">Daniel</st>. <st data-num="03588" class="">For</st> these <st data-num="01697" class="">matters</st> are <st data-num="05640" class="">closed</st> and <st data-num="02856" class="">sealed</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> the <st data-num="06256" class="">time</st> of the <st data-num="07093" class="">end</st>.

<st data-num="07227" class="">Many</st> will be <st data-num="01305" class="">purified</st>, <st data-num="03835" class="">made clean</st>, and <st data-num="06884" class="">refined</st>, but the <st data-num="07563" class="">wicked</st> will go on <st data-num="07561" class="">being wicked</st>. <st data-num="03808 03605">None</st> of the <st data-num="07563" class="">wicked</st> will <st data-num="0995" class="">understand</st>, though the <st data-num="07919" class="">wise</st> will <st data-num="0995" class="">understand</st>.

From the <st data-num="06256" class="">time</st> that the <st data-num="08548" class="">daily sacrifice</st> is <st data-num="05493" class="">removed</st> and the <st data-num="08251" class="">abomination</st> that <st data-num="08074" class="">causes desolation</st> is <st data-num="05414" class="">set in place</st>,<n id="1" /> there are <st data-num="0505 03967 08673">1,290</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st>.

<st data-num="0835" class="">Blessed</st> is the one who <st data-num="02442" class="">waits</st> and <st data-num="05060" class="">attains</st> to the <st data-num="0505 07969 03967 07970 02568">1,335</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st>.
But you should go your way until the end. You will rest, and then at the end of the days you will arise to receive what you have been allotted.”
